title: 81 49–50 4 "Rabid Rabbits"/"Avalanche!""Are You Happy? The Doctor Called Witch!"Transliteration: "Happī kai? Majo to yobareta isha!" (Japanese:ハッピーかい?魔女と呼ばれた医者!) Kōnosuke Uda Michiru Shimada September 16, 2001(2001-09-16)[9] September 10, 2005September 17, 2005[10]
transformers_text: 81 49 50 4 Rabid Rabbits Avalanche Are You Happy The Doctor Called Witch Transliteration H app kai Majo to yo bare ta isha Japanese K no suke Uda Michiru Shimada September 16 2001 2001 09 16 9 September 10 2005 September 17 2005 10 While Sanji and Luffy fight off the wilderness the islander's worst nightmare turns true as Wa pol returns to the island Dalton turns into a bison with his Zo an type Ox Ox Fruit Model Bison powers to confront him The doctor is discovered to be on the other side of the island and Us opp Viv i and Dalton rush to find her Dalton however returns as he hears of Wa pol's return
